name: Chill Space
description:
A simple game in which the player chills out and avoids getting blown up by meteors. Mouse to move. Get points by avoiding said meteors!

NB: Hit-detection not implemented yet, so you'll never crash


Details

Written in Chicken Scheme, using the doodle egg by Christian Kellerman.


Thanks

Amazing soundtrack by Sumiwaves

Background art modified from assets by NoLogoGames

Ship and meteor sprites by Kenney.nl
